description.fr: {%Attack} Déclenche {explosion:ParameterizedEffectExecution.932.ex} si la cible est HUILÉE\_.
description.en: {%Attack} Triggers {explosion:ParameterizedEffectExecution.932.ex} if the target is OILED\_.
description.es: {%Attack} Activa {explosion:ParameterizedEffectExecution.932.ex} si el objetivo está ENGRASADO\_.
description.de: {%Attack} Löst {explosion:ParameterizedEffectExecution.932.ex} aus, falls das Ziel GEÖLT\_ ist.
description.pt: {%Attack} Aciona {explosion:ParameterizedEffectExecution.932.ex} se o alvo estiver OLEOSO\_.

bgDescription.fr: Un brassard qui mettra vos ennemis dans tous leurs états.
bgDescription.en: This armband will put your enemies in a right awful state.
bgDescription.es: Un brazalete que mantendrá pegados a él a tus enemigos.
bgDescription.de: Eine Armbinde, die deine Gegner völlig außer Rand und Band geraten lässt.
bgDescription.pt: Um braçadeira que deixará os seus inimigos em todos os estados possíveis.
